posts.cooked_content: @carlton sir in google form it is written to submit email address of peer but the mail TDS team has sent has 3 drive links .so we have to submit drive links or like create the email by adding “@ds.study.iitm.ac.in” after the username
posts.cleaned_text: @carlton sir in google form it is written to submit email address of peer but the mail TDS team has sent has 3 drive links .so we have to submit drive links or like create the email by adding “@ds.study.iitm.ac.in” after the username

posts.cooked_content: If you actually open the drive link you will see the student email. You have to use that email for submitting the form.
